activities: Pall Corporation receives Personal Information and Personal Human Resources Data from the EU and Switzerland in both electronic and manual form for, among other things, human resource and business reasons such as payroll administration, maintaining accurate benefits records, general administration of our employer/employee relationships, managing operating plans, meeting governmental reporting requirements, security, health and safety management, customer service, product development and marketing.
